verses.verse: He brought <S%H935><s%> me to the temple, <S%H1964><s%> and measured <S%H4058><s%> the posts, <S%H352><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%> on the one side, <S%H6311><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%> on the other side, <S%H6311><s%> which was the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the tent. <S%H168><s%>

The breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the entrance <S%H6607><s%> was ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and the sides <S%H3802><s%> of the entrance <S%H6607><s%> were five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> on the one side, <S%H2568><s%> and five cubits <S%H520><s%> on the other side: <S%H4058><s%> and he measured its length, <S%H753><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth, <S%H7341><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

Then went <S%H935><s%> he inward, <S%H6441><s%> and measured <S%H4058><s%> each post <S%H352><s%> of the entrance, <S%H6607><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and the entrance, <S%H6607><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the entrance, <S%H6607><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

He measured <S%H4058><s%> its length, <S%H753><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth, <S%H7341><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the temple: <S%H1964><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H6944><s%> This is the most holy place. <S%H6944><s%>

Then he measured <S%H4058><s%> the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of every side room, <S%H6763><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> all around <S%H5439><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> on every side. <S%H5439><s%>

The side <S%H6763><s%> rooms <S%H6763><s%> were in three <S%H7969><s%> stories, <S%H6763><s%> one over another, and thirty <S%H7970><s%> in order; <S%H6471><s%> and they entered <S%H935><s%> into the wall <S%H7023><s%> which belonged to the house <S%H1004><s%> for the side rooms <S%H6763><s%> all around, <S%H5439><s%> that they might have hold <S%H270><s%> therein, <S%H270><s%> and not have hold in the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the house. <S%H1004><s%>

The side rooms <S%H6763><s%> were broader <S%H7337><s%> as they encompassed <S%H5437><s%> the house higher <S%H4605><s%> and higher; <S%H4141><s%> for the encompassing of the house <S%H1004><s%> went higher and higher <S%H4605><s%> around <S%H4141><s%> the house: <S%H1004><s%> therefore the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> continued upward; <S%H4605><s%> and so one went up <S%H5927><s%> from the lowest <S%H8481><s%> room to the highest <S%H5945><s%> by the middle room. <S%H8484><s%>

I saw <S%H7200><s%> also that the house <S%H1004><s%> had a raised <S%H1363><s%> base all around: <S%H5439><s%> the foundations <S%H4328><s%> of the side rooms <S%H6763><s%> were a full <S%H4393><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> of six <S%H8337><s%> great <S%H679><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

The thickness <S%H7341><s%> of the wall, <S%H7023><s%> which was for the side rooms, <S%H6763><s%> on the outside, <S%H2351><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%> and that which was left <S%H3240><s%> was the place <S%H1004><s%> of the side rooms <S%H6763><s%> that belonged to the house. <S%H1004><s%>
Between the rooms <S%H3957><s%> was a breadth <S%H7341><s%> of twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> on every side. <S%H5439><s%>

The doors <S%H6607><s%> of the side rooms <S%H6763><s%> were toward the place that was left, <S%H3240><s%> one <S%H259><s%> door <S%H6607><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the north, <S%H6828><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> door <S%H6607><s%> toward the south: <S%H1864><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> that was left <S%H3240><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> all around. <S%H5439><s%>

The building <S%H1146><s%> that was before <S%H6440><s%> the separate place <S%H1508><s%> at the side <S%H6285><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> was seventy <S%H7657><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad; <S%H7341><s%> and the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the building <S%H1146><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> thick <S%H7341><s%> all around, <S%H5439><s%> and its length <S%H753><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

So he measured <S%H4058><s%> the house, <S%H1004><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long; <S%H753><s%> and the separate place, <S%H1508><s%> and the building, <S%H1140><s%> with its walls, <S%H7023><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long; <S%H753><s%>

also the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the face <S%H6440><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and of the separate place <S%H1508><s%> toward the east, <S%H6921><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

He measured <S%H4058><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> of the building <S%H1146><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the separate place <S%H1508><s%> which was at its back, <S%H310><s%> and its galleries <S%H862><s%> on the one side and on the other side, <S%H3967><s%> one hundred cubits; <S%H520><s%> and the inner <S%H6442><s%> temple, <S%H1964><s%> and the porches <S%H197><s%> of the court; <S%H2691><s%>

the thresholds, <S%H5592><s%> and the closed <S%H331><s%> windows, <S%H2474><s%> and the galleries <S%H862><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on their three stories, <S%H7969><s%> over against <S%H5048><s%> the threshold, <S%H5592><s%> with wood <S%H6086><s%> ceilings <S%H7824><s%> all around, <S%H5439><s%> and from the ground <S%H776><s%> up to the windows, <S%H2474><s%> (now the windows <S%H2474><s%> were covered <S%H3680><s%>),

to the space above the door, <S%H6607><s%> even to the inner <S%H6442><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and outside, <S%H2351><s%> and by all the wall <S%H7023><s%> all around <S%H5439><s%> inside <S%H6442><s%> and outside, <S%H2435><s%> by measure. <S%H4060><s%>

It was made <S%H6213><s%> with cherubim <S%H3742><s%> and palm trees; <S%H8561><s%> and a palm tree <S%H8561><s%> was between cherub <S%H3742><s%> and cherub, <S%H3742><s%> and every cherub <S%H3742><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> faces; <S%H6440><s%>

so that there was the face <S%H6440><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> toward the palm tree <S%H8561><s%> on the one side, <S%H6440><s%> and the face of a young lion <S%H3715><s%> toward the palm tree <S%H8561><s%> on the other side. <S%H6213><s%> thus was it made through all the house <S%H1004><s%> all around: <S%H5439><s%>
from the ground <S%H776><s%> to above the door <S%H6607><s%> were cherubim <S%H3742><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%> made: <S%H6213><s%> thus was the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the temple. <S%H1964><s%>

As for the temple, <S%H1964><s%> the door posts <S%H4201><s%> were squared; <S%H7251><s%> and as for the face <S%H6440><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of it was as the appearance of the temple. <S%H4758><s%>

The altar <S%H4196><s%> was of wood, <S%H6086><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high, <S%H1364><s%> and its length <S%H753><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and its corners, <S%H4740><s%> and its length, <S%H753><s%> and its walls, <S%H7023><s%> were of wood: <S%H6086><s%> and he said <S%H1696><s%> to me, <S%H7979><s%> This is the table that is before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
The temple <S%H1964><s%> and the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> doors. <S%H1817><s%>

The doors <S%H1817><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> leaves <S%H1817><s%> apiece, <S%H8147><s%> two turning <S%H4142><s%> leaves: <S%H1817><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> leaves for the one <S%H259><s%> door, <S%H1817><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> leaves <S%H1817><s%> for the other. <S%H312><s%>

There were made <S%H6213><s%> on them, <S%H1817><s%> on the doors of the temple, <S%H1964><s%> cherubim <S%H3742><s%> and palm trees, <S%H8561><s%> like as were made <S%H6213><s%> on the walls; <S%H7023><s%> and there was a threshold <S%H5646><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> outside. <S%H2351><s%>

There were closed <S%H331><s%> windows <S%H2474><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%> on the one side and on the other side, <S%H3802><s%> on the sides of the porch: <S%H197><s%> thus were the side rooms <S%H6763><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and the thresholds. <S%H5646><s%>
